meaningMnemonic: Whenever something bad happens to your <kanji>country</kanji> to feel an exceptional amount of <kanji>grief</kanji> for your fellow country people. This is some serious <vocabulary>patriotic concern</vocabulary> you've got going on. Let's hope you use those concerns for something good and don't get too carried away.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
